Message: Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?

Okay, Let's start fresh! What can I help you with?
Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
I'm here to help with whatever you need! Let me know your question, and I'll do my best to assist you right away.
Content rejection - Violation of Advertising Policy - The URL/Landing page(s) associated with your ad is currently broken. Please provide a working version.

It looks like your ad was rejected due to a broken URL or landing page. To resolve this, please ensure that the URL you provided is correct and accessible. Double-check for any typos or errors in the URL, and make sure the landing page is live and functioning properly. Once you've fixed the issue, you can resubmit your ad for review. For more details on handling ad rejections, you can refer to our article here: [My ad got rejected. What's next?](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/18085960681101-My-ad-got-rejected-What-s-next)
I verified that it is working
Great! Since you've verified that the URL is working, you can go ahead and resubmit your ad for review. If you encounter any further issues or need additional assistance, feel free to reach out!
Nothing has changed, what is to prevent the rejection again

If your ad was rejected due to a broken URL and you've confirmed that the URL is now working, it should not be rejected for the same reason again. However, make sure to review other aspects of your ad to ensure compliance with all advertising policies. If you believe the rejection was a mistake, you can appeal by emailing adsupport@newsbreak.com with details about your ad and why you think it complies with our policies.

I'm sorry to hear that your ad status changed to "Rejected." Please check your email for a message from adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line â€˜Urgent: Ad Rejected - Action Required.â€™ This email will provide specific details on why your ad was rejected. Once you have that information, you can address the issue and resubmit your ad. If you believe the rejection was in error, you can appeal by responding to the email or contacting adsupport@newsbreak.com.
Thank you for your feedback. You can click the close icon below to close this widget.
